com.tabuto.j2dgf
Class Game2D

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.tabuto.j2dgf.Game2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSimLife
public abstract class Game2D
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable

Game2D is an Abstract Class that represents a single Game.

Extends this class to add the Sprites Group and your own CollisionDetector Override the initGame() methods to initialize Groups and register Collsions to the CollisionManager. Override the drawStuff(Graphics) to execute the Sprite Drawing. Use the methods provides from class Group to move and/or draw your entire sprite collection.

See the GameTest class on the test package.

Version:
0.7.0
Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
Group, Sprite, CollisionManager, CollisionDetector, Serialized Form

initGame

public abstract void initGame()
This abstract method initialize the component of the game:
  • Group
  • CollisionDetector
  • CollisionBoundDetector (if needs!) N.B. The CollisionManager has been initialize in the Costructor method.

    See Also:
    CollisionManager, Group, CollisionBoundDetector, CollisionDetector
